item.title: Luis Fonsi - Llegaste Tú - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Llegaste Tu on the ukulele by Luis Fonsi and Juan Luis Guerra. The chords used are C F G Am Dm Em F#dim.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Jarabe De Palo - La Flaca
item.description:

¡Hey! Échale un ojo a mis molones artículos de merchan en https://www.redbubble.com/es/people/Ukeledu/shop
________________________
STRUMMING PATTERN / RASGUEO:
Verso / Verse: DxxDxxDxDxxDxDDD UDUDUDU D D UDU Puente / Bridge: DxxDxxDxDxxDxxDxD DUDUDD UDUDUDU Estribillo / Chorus: D D DUDUD D DUDUD D DUDD UDUDUDU
D: Down / Hacia abajo U: Up / Hacia arriba x: Muted strigs / Cuerdas muteadas
________________________
Hey! If you liked this video, give me a like, subscribe and comment your doubts, suggestions or anything you want.
- ¡Hey! Si te ha gustado el vídeo, dame like, suscríbete y comenta tus dudas, sugerencias o lo que te apetezca.
